attributes.title: Little Bird
attributes.7: yes==In the books==In the ''Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, this character does not appear but Jorah does leave Daenerys in the markets outside Vaes Dothrak enigmatically citing personal business before reappearing. Varys is known for employing orphans and urchins as his "little birds".==See also==*AWOIAF

sections.In the books: In the ''[[Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, this character does not appear but Jorah does leave Daenerys in the markets outside [[Vaes Dothrak]] enigmatically citing personal business before reappearing. Varys is known for employing orphans and urchins as his "little birds".
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He delivers a royal pardon to [[Jorah Mormont]] in the markets of [[Vaes Dothrak]]. Jorah realizes that the timing is suspicious and returns to the side of [[Daenerys Targaryen]].<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>

title: Little Bird (You Win or You Die)
